Jackson.Mississippi State Capitol:
The Mississippi State Capitol in Jackson, Mississippi, is the state capitol building of the U.S. state of Mississippi, housing the Mississippi Legislature. The building was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1969, and designated a Mississippi Landmark in 1986 and a National Historic Landmark in 2016.


== The "New" Capitol ==
The Mississippi State Capitol is located in Jackson and has been the home of Mississippi's state legislature since 1903.
